TechnologicalSupremacy.name: Stellar Expansion
TechnologicalSupremacy.description: Launch colony vessels or terraform alien worlds to ensure your civilization's survival and dominance.

TechnologicalSupremacy.name: Quantum Leap
TechnologicalSupremacy.description: Achieve breakthroughs in physics or engineering that redefine the limits of technology and warfare.

TechnologicalSupremacy.name: Singularity Drive
TechnologicalSupremacy.description: Fuse consciousness with machine or build an AI that can reshape society or reality.

TechnologicalSupremacy.name: Genetic Apotheosis
TechnologicalSupremacy.description: Control life itself by perfecting bodies, unlocking immortality, or creating superior castes.

CulturalIdeologicalDominance.name: Cultural Eclipse
CulturalIdeologicalDominance.description: Make your way of life, philosophy, or media so pervasive that other factions adopt it voluntarily or gradually fade.

CulturalIdeologicalDominance.name: Symbolic Hegemony
CulturalIdeologicalDominance.description: Ensure your language, dress, or rituals become synonymous with modernity or progress.

CulturalIdeologicalDominance.name: Tradition Warden
CulturalIdeologicalDominance.description: Restore and safeguard ancient values, arts, or codes against a world losing its soul.

MilitaryTerritorialControl.name: Iron Unification
MilitaryTerritorialControl.description: Bring surrounding regions under one banner—by blade, treaty, or fear—to create a single order.

MilitaryTerritorialControl.name: Strategic Intimidation
MilitaryTerritorialControl.description: Ensure no one dares challenge your might through demonstrations of force or precision raids.

MilitaryTerritorialControl.name: Protective Dominion
MilitaryTerritorialControl.description: Spread your control under the guise of peacekeeping or guarding against chaos/anarchy.

SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.name: Universal Revelation
SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.description: Spread your divine truth until no realm remains untouched by your faith.

SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.name: Prophetic Fulfillment
SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.description: Carry out ancient prophecies to legitimize your regime and inspire believers across borders.

SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.name: Sacred Authority
SpiritualReligiousFulfillment.description: Build holy sites or relic networks that give your leaders moral or mystical superiority.

DiplomaticSupremacy.name: Global Architect
DiplomaticSupremacy.description: Be the founding voice or secret hand guiding a stable international order.

DiplomaticSupremacy.name: Alliance Web
DiplomaticSupremacy.description: Weave a net of marriages, treaties, and mutual pacts so tightly that no war occurs without your blessing.

DiplomaticSupremacy.name: Moral Vanguard
DiplomaticSupremacy.description: Earn the position as the world's ethical compass, settling disputes and delivering justice.

EconomicMastery.name: Trade Dominance
EconomicMastery.description: Control major trade routes, guilds, or ports, making the flow of goods your greatest weapon.

EconomicMastery.name: Credit Empire
EconomicMastery.description: Bind other governments through loans, reparations, and economic “gifts” that demand political loyalty.

EconomicMastery.name: Production Supremacy
EconomicMastery.description: Outbuild, outcraft, and outsupply all others, so even your enemies depend on your wares.
